name: Squat
description: Classic squat that engages the glutes.
form_notes: Toes slightly out, move butt back first, tighten core and fight the back trying to bend over forward.

name: Overhead Press
description: Pushing the bar above the head to a full extension.

name: Military Press
description: Overhead press but with feet pressed together.
form_notes: At full extension, lean head forward a little and hold. Move consistently and purposefully thorughout the movement.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Pulling down with palms facing you, engaging the lats.
form_notes: Lat pulldowns are best done slowly, especially while building up strength.

name: Reverse Lat Pulldown
description: Reverse grip pulldown, with palms facing away.

name: Single Arm Lat Pulldown
description: One arm at a time lat pulldown.

name: Single Arm Reverse Lat Pulldown
description: One arm at a time reverse lat pulldown.

name: Bench Press
description: Pushing the bar away from the chest while lying down.
form_notes: Bar should go down to just about where it touches the chest. Or at least until elbows are 90 degress.

name: Decline Bench Press
description: Bench press with the bench angled down.

name: Incline Bench Press
description: Bench press with the bench angled up.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Bench press using dumbbells.

name: Decline Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Decline bench press using dumbbells.

name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Incline bench press using dumbbells.

name: Dumbbell Chest Fly
description: Center contraction bringing arms from the side to the center.
form_notes: It should not feel like a press. Can bend arms up to 90 degrees.

name: Back Extension
description: Back extension from bent to straight on back extension machine.
form_notes: Doing this exercise slowly is important for building up back strength.

name: Sit-Ups
description: Classic sit-up with feet planted on the ground.
form_notes: Feet should not come off the ground.

name: Crunches
description: Classic sit-up variation with knees in the air.

name: Straight Leg Cruches
description: Classic sit-up variation with legs straight in the air.

name: Russian Twists
description: Side-to-side motion that engages the obliques.
form_notes: Do not do this one fast, it is best done slower and more controlled.

name: Leg Lifts
description: While lying on back, life legs from a neutral position upward.

name: High Crunches
description: Crunches with feet flat on ground and arms extended vertically.

name: Plank
description: The classic basic plank.

name: Star Plank
description: Plank variation with arms and legs spread out to the side.

name: Sitting Punches
description: From sit-up position punch to the left and right of the knees.

name: V With Rotations
description: V-sit-ups with outstretched arms reaching to the left and right of knees.

name: Half Wipers
description: Crunch form but moving knees to the ground on each side.
form_notes: Use arms for stability. Going slow is important.
